title: KI Puzzle 1000 Piece Puzzle for Adults Madalina Tantareanu Cities at Midnight: Prague Art Jigsaw Puzzle 27x20 KI Puzzles
descriptions:
KI Puzzle – Cities at Midnight: Prague (1000 Pieces)

- What it is: A beautiful jigsaw puzzle showing Prague at night, painted by artist Madalina Tantareanu.
- Finished size: 27 inches wide by 20 inches tall. It fits well on a card table or dining table.
- Who it’s for: Adults who enjoy a calm, thoughtful activity.

Why you’ll like it:
- Easy to see, rich colors: Bold, bright artwork helps you tell pieces apart.
- Helpful guide included: A full-color poster shows the finished picture, so you always have a clear reference.
- Low mess: Pieces come in a sealed plastic bag with very low “puzzle dust,” keeping your table and hands clean.
- Sturdy pieces: Made from recycled paperboard that holds up well to repeated handling.
- Hours of gentle challenge: Enjoy a relaxing pastime that keeps the mind active without rushing.

What’s in the box:
- 1000 puzzle pieces in a sealed bag.
- A full-size color poster to guide you.

Tips for an easy start:
- Clear a flat surface at least 30 x 22 inches.
- Sort edge pieces first to make the frame.
- Group pieces by color and pattern (the night sky, buildings, lights).
- Use the poster to match tricky areas.

Great for:
- Quiet afternoons, lazy Sundays, or evenings with family.
- A thoughtful gift for birthdays or holidays.
- Making memories while keeping the brain engaged.

Settle in with a cup of tea, follow the poster, and watch Prague at midnight come to life—one satisfying piece at a time.
